snippet: The dismissal of the manager, Troy Carter, occurred days before the scheduled release of the singer’s new album. Mr. Carter had managed Lady Gaga since 2007.
abstract: Lady Gaga is said to have fired her longtime manager Troy Carter days before release of her new album Artpop.
lead_paragraph: The dismissal of the manager, Troy Carter, occurred days before the scheduled release of the singer’s new album. Mr. Carter had managed Lady Gaga since 2007.

headline.main: Lady Gaga Said to Fire Her Manager
headline.print_headline: Lady Gaga Is Said to Have Fired Manager
